events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position early this morning, showing strong interest in joining our engineering team.
After review, the application was categorised under Engineering since the candidate's experience matched the software development role requirements.
A recruiter was assigned to this candidate to guide them through the hiring process and schedule the next steps efficiently.
The recruiter conducted the initial screening call, during which the candidate demonstrated a solid understanding of software engineering principles and enthusiasm for the role.
The candidate promptly responded to the screening outcome and expressed eagerness to move forward with the technical interview stage.
The technical interview was scheduled with the engineering panel for the following week to assess the candidate's coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
